Name: Slowpoke Hat
LongDescription: May reduce the Movement Speed of attacking enemies by 1 level when hit. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Slowpoke, Slowbro, and Slowking.  Finding a Slowpoke Hat at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
